mapper.select: SELECT MEMBERP_NO as memberNo, MEMBER_NAME as memberName, MEMBER_ID as memberId, MEMBER_PW as memberPw, PHONE as phone, ADDRESS as address, GENDER as gender, ENROLL_DATE as enrollDate, END_DATE as endDate, END_YN as endYN, BIRTH_DAY as birthDay FROM MEMBER_P WHERE MEMBER_ID=#{memberId} AND MEMBER_PW=#{memberPw} AND END_YN='N'
